tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE park_locations (
  park_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  park_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  established DATE,
  acreage FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE public_parks (
    park_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    park_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    park_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    park_area FLOAT NOT NULL,
    established_date DATE,
    visitor_capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE park_amenities (
    amenity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    amenity_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    amenity_description VARCHAR(200),
    park_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (park_id) REFERENCES public_parks(park_id)
);

CREATE TABLE parks (
  park_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  park_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  area_acres FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE amenities (
  amenity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  amenity_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  park_id INT REFERENCES parks(park_id)
)

CREATE TABLE visitor_statistics (
  stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  park_id INT REFERENCES parks(park_id),
  visitor_count INT,
  date_visited DATE
)

CREATE TABLE park_activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  activity_name VARCHAR(255),
  park_id INT REFERENCES parks(park_id)
)

CREATE TABLE park_staff (
  staff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  staff_name VARCHAR(255),
  role VARCHAR(255),
  park_id INT REFERENCES parks(park_id)
)
